buffer.h

00001 #include "ext_critical.h"
00002 
00003 #if C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACKPUSH
00004     #pragma pack(push, 2)
00005 #elif C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACK
00006     #pragma pack(2)
00007 #endif
00008 
00009 enum {
00010     MAXCHAN = 4
00011 };
00012 
00013 enum {
00014     bi_basefreq = 0,
00015     bi_detune,
00016     bi_lowfreq,
00017     bi_hifreq,
00018     bi_lowvel,
00019     bi_hivel,
00020     bi_gain,
00021     bi_numparams
00022 };
00023 
00024 
00025 /** Data structure for the buffer~ object.
00026     @ingroup buffers
00027 */
00028 typedef struct _buffer
00029 {
00030     t_object b_obj;     ///< doesn't have any signals so it doesn't need to be pxobject
00031     long b_valid;       ///< flag is off during read replacement or editing operation
00032     float *b_samples;   ///< stored with interleaved channels if multi-channel
00033     long b_frames;      ///< number of sample frames (each one is sizeof(float) * b_nchans bytes)
00034     long b_nchans;      ///< number of channels
00035     long b_size;        ///< size of buffer in floats
00036     float b_sr;         ///< sampling rate of the buffer
00037     float b_1oversr;    ///< 1 / sr
00038     float b_msr;        ///< sr * .001
00039     // Mac-specific stuff
00040     float *b_memory;    ///< pointer to where memory starts (initial padding for interp)
00041     t_symbol *b_name;   ///< name of the buffer
00042     short b_vol;
00043     short b_space;
00044     // looping info (from AIFF file)
00045     long b_susloopstart;    ///< looping info (from AIFF file) in samples
00046     long b_susloopend;      ///< looping info (from AIFF file) in samples
00047     long b_relloopstart;    ///< looping info (from AIFF file) in samples
00048     long b_relloopend;      ///< looping info (from AIFF file) in samples
00049     // instrument info (from AIFF file)
00050     short b_inst[bi_numparams];
00051     // window stuff
00052     void *b_wind;
00053     double b_pixperfr;
00054     double b_frperpix;
00055     long b_imagesize;
00056     Point b_scroll;
00057     long b_scrollscale;
00058     long b_selbegin[MAXCHAN];
00059     long b_selend[MAXCHAN];
00060     long b_zoom;
00061     long b_zim[11];
00062     void *b_mouseout;
00063     long b_format;          ///< 'AIFF' or 'Sd2f'
00064     t_symbol *b_filename;   ///< last file read (not written) for readagain message
00065     long b_oldnchans;       ///< used for resizing window in case of # of channels change
00066     void *b_doneout;
00067     long b_outputbytes;     ///< number of bytes used for output sample (1-4)
00068     long b_modtime;         ///< last modified time ("dirty" method)
00069     struct _buffer *b_peer; ///< objects that share this symbol (used as a link in the peers)
00070     Boolean b_owner;        ///< b_memory/b_samples "owned" by this object
00071     long b_outputfmt;       ///< sample type (A_LONG, A_FLOAT, etc.)
00072     long b_inuse;           ///< objects that use buffer should set this during their perform
00073     void *b_dspchain;       ///< dspchain used for this instance
00074 } t_buffer;
00075 
00076 #define BUFWIND(x) ((t_wind *)(x->b_wind))
00077 
00078 #if C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACKPUSH
00079     #pragma pack(pop)
00080 #elif C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACK
00081     #pragma pack()
00082 #endif
